    public class MetropolisTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    a table model based on the abstract table model to retrieve information from the database

      • getSearchQuery

        public void getSearchQuery(java.lang.String symbol,
                  java.lang.String pop,
                  java.lang.String met,
                  java.lang.String cont,
                  boolean match)
        Search query to search the database based on the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        symbol - ">","<" or "=" for the population combo box.
        pop - value of the population field.
        met - value of the metropolis field.
        cont - value of the continent field.
        match - "Exact" or "Partial Match" based on the combo box.
